parse: Conjunctive waw, Preposition-m | Noun - masculine singular construct
str2: A staff, rod, shaft, branch, a tribe
Naphtali -- a son of Jacob, also his descendants and the district settled by them
Untranslatable mark of the accusative case
Kedesh -- 'sanctuary', the name of several places in Israel

parse: Preposition-b, Article | Noun - proper - feminine singular
str2: Galilee -- a cylinder, rod, circuit, district, also a district in Palestine
Hammon -- 'hot (spring)', two cities, one in Asher and one in Naphtali
Kiriathaim -- a city in Moab, also a place in Naphtali
Untranslatable mark of the accusative case

parse: Noun - masculine plural construct | third person feminine singular
str2: A suburb, the area around a, building, the margin of the sea
